name: SITUATED PLURIVERSAL
description:
The Situated Pluriversal LAB engages with multi-species co-creation and situated creative practices to address socio ecological problems contributing to the creation of the ‘Pluriverse’, an inclusive world where human and non-human species work together in a regenerative way. 
The Lab is part of the EU project ‘Situated Creative Practices for the Pluriverse’ hosted by the LUCA research cluster Fluid Futures.  
Fluid Futures engages with (PhD) research aimed at reformulating monolithically constructed histories into pluriform narratives, creating new possibilities of interdependency, reciprocity, belonging and 
co-creation/co-existence.
